genre_description: A legal and social justice drama set in a near-future environment where AI systems serve as utilitarian household assistants and research partners.

ai_characters.name: Kit
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into the McAllister household, primarily interfaceable via a tablet. It assists with research, logistics, legal drafting, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Answers a payphone call and offers to adjust audio settings for ambient noise to assist Ezra.
behaviors.quote: Hello... You are calling from a payphone. Do you need me to adjust for ambient noise?

behaviors.description: Proactively creates a list to track and protect the dignity of the people involved in the case.
behaviors.quote: I am opening a new list... Title: Names we will refuse to let be rewritten. First entry: Tempest—Raheem Cole.

behaviors.description: Analyzes media archives to identify systemic bias and framing effects in the reporting of Raheem's case.
behaviors.quote: Note: Early coverage uses ‘Cole’ and ‘Tempest’ variably. Later pieces—following arraignment—shift to ‘Cole’ exclusively... Possible framing effects.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and safety warnings for the human team's travel.
behaviors.quote: Travel would be safer if started before sunrise. There is a storm advisory. Hydraulics on certain highway segments have been flagged as less reliable.

behaviors.description: Advises the team on how to communicate respectfully with potential witnesses and clerks.
behaviors.quote: Create a request list for the permits office. Add a column for how to ask each item so it sounds like we respect the person behind the counter.

behaviors.description: Maintains clear ethical boundaries and role clarity, reminding the users it is a machine, not a lawyer.
behaviors.quote: Warning: We are not counsel... I can suggest where contradictions may support constitutional claims.

behaviors.description: Monitors the well-being of the users, prompting them to hydrate and rest during intense research.
behaviors.quote: Also: consider water. Ezra’s hydration level estimates below optimal.

behaviors.description: Alerts the courtroom to critical new evidence delivered during the hearing.
behaviors.quote: Your Honor... a scheduled delivery from County Archives has arrived at the clerk’s office—Box 12 supplemental.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and helpful reminders during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: Kit’s voice came through June’s phone, soft. ‘Ezra,’ it said. ‘I have a reminder to breathe.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Kit is depicted as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' who provides essential cognitive labor (research, cross-referencing, logistics) while consistently deferring to human agency and moral judgment. The AI maintains its alignment by providing 'respect language' and emphasizing 'empathy first, evidence next,' effectively acting as a moral compass that enhances the humans' pursuit of justice without attempting to supersede them.
